articles.title: Mysterious ‘phantom building’ passes through Manchester in Google Maps glitch - The Independent
articles.description: It is unclear what’s causing the strange bug on the popular mapping software
articles.content:
A strange Google Maps glitch has been making phantom buildings appear on the popular mapping software.
